definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: The team seems unstoppable in their drive for the championship.
sentences.chinese: 这支球队争取冠军的气势似锐不可当。

sentences.english: The flame rises as high as one thousand feet. The dragon jubilates and people celebrate vigorously.
sentences.chinese: 一行火焰高百丈，龙腾人欢气势雄。

sentences.english: Such majestic demeanor as befits a nephew of mine.
sentences.chinese: 气势如虹，不愧是朕的侄儿。

sentences.english: They saw the lofty peak in all its majesty.
sentences.chinese: 他们看到了高耸的山峰，气势雄伟壮丽。

sentences.english: This is the unique charm of Wang.
sentences.chinese: 这就是王朔独有的气势。

sentences.english: The entire place palace has the bright Tibet typestyle, according to Shan Erjian, imposing.
sentences.chinese: 整座宫殿具有鲜明的藏式风格，依山而建，气势雄伟。

sentences.english: The Little Princess Dress also comes with a matching cone style hat.
sentences.chinese: 小公主裙还带有一个锥气势派头匹配的饰品。

sentences.english: The tremendous momentum of the Yellow River is inspiring.
sentences.chinese: 黄河的磅礴气势使人振奋。

sentences.english: Second is the spirited imagination intrinsic makings and the external imposing manner.
sentences.chinese: 二是郁怒激昂的意象内在气质和外在气势。

sentences.english: Peak out seven, and skyscraper highest peaks overlapping range upon range of hills, spectacular momentum.
sentences.chinese: 七峰罗列，摩天最高，层峦叠嶂，气势壮观。

sentences.english: Now it is a spectacular scene to see 4 large airplanes are being assembled in the plant.
sentences.chinese: 眼下，总装厂房内4架大型飞机同场组装，气势壮观。

sentences.english: I am the only real world has the momentum.
sentences.chinese: 拥有天下舍我其谁的气势。

sentences.english: This is no different then not fighting terror groups, the threat makes you back off.
sentences.chinese: 这和恐吓恐怖份子一样，就是要在气势上吓退对方。

sentences.english: He's always making unwarranted accusations against others. His manner is intolerably aggressive.
sentences.chinese: 他动不动就对别人横加指责，气势逼人。

sentences.english: When the oil spill happened we wanted to continue that fantastic year, we wanted to continue the momentum.
sentences.chinese: 漏油事件发生时，我们想保持这股气势。

sentences.english: The Mencius' essays, which are greatly powerful and eloquent, are also one of the classical works of Confucianism.
sentences.chinese: 孟子的散文也是儒家经典之一，气势如虹，十分雄辩。

definition: murderous spirit/aura of death/to vent one's anger
